meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beneficial.
meanings.sent1: The beneficialnesses of fresh air and exercise are well-known.
meanings.sent2: The community garden's beneficialnesses are evident in the healthy produce it provides.
meanings.sent3: The beneficialnesses of eating vegetables can turn anyone into a health nut!
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the beneficialnesses of a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The beneficialnesses of kindness can truly brighten someone's day.

meanings.definition: The beneficial effects or outcomes of something.
meanings.sent1: The beneficialnesses of the new medicine were quickly apparent.
meanings.sent2: The beneficialnesses of regular exercise include improved health and mood.
meanings.sent3: The beneficialnesses of a good night's sleep cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent4: The beneficialnesses of teamwork were evident in their successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The beneficialnesses of laughter are contagious and uplifting.
